page.title: 15Housing-W.Pilton,Edinburgh
page.content: There are many different types of houses in the area. For example we have{high-rise flats, bungalows, {semi-detached}and{detached housing}and there is even a{farmhouse}nearby. Until recently all the local houses were rented from{Edinburgh District {Council}but some of the six in a block{tenement}variety have been sold off to private building companies in an effort to improve the area. These firms are also{renovating}other local authority houses, which will be rented as before. This work includes fitting sloping roofs, wooden window frames, central heating and various other {improvements}that the local authority could not afford to do by themselves. We will have a mix of{owner occupied and{rented accommodation.
